Package controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuBarListener
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuBarListener
Author:
Alexander Steinberg The app's main controller. Responsible for managing functionality that concerns the whole app: opening a new file, quitting the application, running a batch analysis.

      Description copied from interface: MenuBarListener
